title: mc_observers::KinematicInertialObserver
description: Kinematic Intertial observer: floating base observation from IMU and kinematics

robot.description: Name of the robot to observe (control)

updateRobot.description: Name of the robot to observe (real)

imuBodySensor.description: Name of the body sensor containing IMU measurements (requires orientation)

cutoff.description: Cutoff period for the low-pass filter on velocity. Must be at least twice the timestep

anchorFrame.title: Kinematic Anchor Frame
anchorFrame.description: Parameters for the kinematic anchor frame

datastoreFunction.description: Name of the datastore entry for the anchorFrame function. This datastore entry must exist, and it must return a continuous kinematic anchor frame (typically a point in-between the contacts). Please refer to the observers tutorial for more information.

maxAnchorFrameDiscontinuity.description: Norm of translation error between the current and new anchor frame computed by "datastoreFunction". This is used to detect anchor frame discontinuities, and consequently prevent discontinuities in velocity estimation.

pose.description: When true, display the estimated pose

velocity.description: When true, display the estimated velocity as an arrow

anchorFrame.description: When true, display the anchor frame (control)

anchorFrameReal.description: When true, display the anchor frame (real)

advanced.description: Displays an additional GUI tab containing advanced controls. These are NOT intended to be used outside of a debugging context, use with caution.

pose.description: When true, logs the estimated pose

velocity.description: When true, logs the estimated velocity

anchorFrame.description: When true, logs the anchor frame (control and real)
